text: (Dutare,) avaru nim'modane, punarut'thanada ghaligeya kuritu, adu yavaga baralide endu prasnisuttare. Heliri; adara jnanavu nanna odeyana bali ide, adannu (punarut'thanavannu) adara samayadalli prakatapadisuvavanu avana horatu beraru alla. Adu akasagala hagu bhumiya palige tumba kathinavagiruvudu. Nim'ma balige adu tira hathattane bandu biduvudu. Nivu adanne kayuttiruviro embante avaru nim'modane (a kuritu) keluttare. Heliri; adara jnanavu allahana bali matra ide. Adare heccina janaru aritilla
